title: England vs Bulgaria player ratings: Harry Kane and Raheem Sterling stars in Euro 2020 qualifier rout
text:
England thrashed Bulgaria 4-0 at Wembley as they proved far too good for the visitors in Euro 2020 qualifying.

Harry Kane scored a hat-trick in typically opportunistic style, scoring two penalties and a poacher's finish in the box.

That was the opener, set up by Raheem Sterling whose sharp runs and tight dribbling impressed throughout.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Later in the game Mason Mount came off the bench to make his international debut.

The result sent England back to the top of Group A, above Kosovo who they play on Tuesday at St Mary's Stadium.
